about_the_game:
Bunny Space Odyssey: The countdown Soundtrack is composed by Anna Glaid (Aink) - the musician and developer of AinkOink Studio.
This small but catchy soundtrack sets the atmosphere for a game about finding hidden helmets. A mix of bass guitar, drums, keyboards, and robotic synths creates a unique vibe.
Listen on repeat and enjoy!
